# wallix-bastion_configoption (Data Source)

Provides information about a specific configuration option.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Get a specific configuration option
data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "session_timeout" {
  option_name = "session_timeout"
}

# Use the configuration value in a resource
resource "wallix-bastion_connection_policy" "policy" {
  policy_name     = "default_policy"
  session_timeout = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.session_timeout.value
}

# Get multiple configuration options
data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "max_sessions" {
  option_name = "max_concurrent_sessions"
}

data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "log_level" {
  option_name = "log_level"
}

data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "backup_retention" {
  option_name = "backup_retention_days"
}

# Security-related configuration options
data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "password_policy" {
  option_name = "default_password_policy"
}

data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "encryption_algorithm" {
  option_name = "default_encryption_algorithm"
}

data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "certificate_validity" {
  option_name = "default_certificate_validity"
}

# Network configuration options
data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "listen_port" {
  option_name = "ssh_listen_port"
}

data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "rdp_port" {
  option_name = "rdp_listen_port"
}

data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "proxy_timeout" {
  option_name = "proxy_connection_timeout"
}

# Audit and logging configuration
data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "audit_retention" {
  option_name = "audit_log_retention_days"
}

data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "syslog_server" {
  option_name = "syslog_server_address"
}

data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "log_format" {
  option_name = "log_output_format"
}

# Authentication configuration
data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "auth_timeout" {
  option_name = "authentication_timeout"
}

data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "mfa_required" {
  option_name = "require_mfa"
}

data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "ldap_timeout" {
  option_name = "ldap_connection_timeout"
}

# System limits and performance
data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "max_file_size" {
  option_name = "max_upload_file_size"
}

data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "session_recording" {
  option_name = "enable_session_recording"
}

data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "concurrent_connections" {
  option_name = "max_concurrent_connections"
}

# Using configuration options in locals
locals {
  # Collect multiple configuration values
  system_config = {
    session_timeout    = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.session_timeout.value
    max_sessions      = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.max_sessions.value
    log_level         = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.log_level.value
    backup_retention  = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.backup_retention.value
  }
  
  # Security configuration
  security_config = {
    password_policy      = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.password_policy.value
    encryption_algorithm = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.encryption_algorithm.value
    certificate_validity = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.certificate_validity.value
    mfa_required        = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.mfa_required.value
  }
  
  # Network configuration
  network_config = {
    ssh_port       = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.listen_port.value
    rdp_port       = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.rdp_port.value
    proxy_timeout  = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.proxy_timeout.value
  }
}

# Output configuration values
output "system_configuration" {
  description = "Current system configuration values"
  value       = local.system_config
}

output "security_configuration" {
  description = "Current security configuration values"
  value       = local.security_config
  sensitive   = true
}

output "network_configuration" {
  description = "Current network configuration values"
  value       = local.network_config
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `config_id` (String)

### Optional

- `options_list` (Set of String)

### Read-Only

- `config_name` (String)
- `date` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `name` (String)
- `options` (List of String)

## Usage Notes

### Configuration Option Categories

**System Configuration:**

- `session_timeout`: Default session timeout in minutes
- `max_concurrent_sessions`: Maximum concurrent sessions per user
- `log_level`: System logging level (debug, info, warning, error)
- `backup_retention_days`: Backup retention period
- `system_timezone`: System timezone setting

**Security Configuration:**

- `default_password_policy`: Default password policy name
- `default_encryption_algorithm`: Default encryption algorithm
- `default_certificate_validity`: Default certificate validity period
- `require_mfa`: Whether MFA is required system-wide
- `password_history_count`: Number of previous passwords to remember

**Network Configuration:**

- `ssh_listen_port`: SSH service listening port
- `rdp_listen_port`: RDP service listening port
- `https_listen_port`: HTTPS service listening port
- `proxy_connection_timeout`: Proxy connection timeout in seconds
- `max_concurrent_connections`: Maximum concurrent connections

**Authentication Configuration:**

- `authentication_timeout`: Authentication timeout in seconds
- `ldap_connection_timeout`: LDAP connection timeout
- `radius_timeout`: RADIUS authentication timeout
- `saml_timeout`: SAML authentication timeout
- `kerberos_timeout`: Kerberos authentication timeout

**Audit and Logging:**

- `audit_log_retention_days`: Audit log retention period
- `syslog_server_address`: Syslog server address
- `log_output_format`: Log format (text, json, syslog)
- `enable_session_recording`: Whether session recording is enabled
- `recording_retention_days`: Session recording retention period

### Common Configuration Options

**Performance and Limits:**

```terraform
data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "performance" {
  for_each = toset([
    "max_upload_file_size",
    "max_download_file_size",
    "connection_pool_size",
    "thread_pool_size",
    "memory_limit_mb"
  ])
  
  option_name = each.key
}
```

**Security Settings:**

```terraform
data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "security" {
  for_each = toset([
    "require_mfa",
    "default_password_policy",
    "certificate_validity_days",
    "ssh_key_algorithm",
    "encryption_cipher"
  ])
  
  option_name = each.key
}
```

**Network Settings:**

```terraform
data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "network" {
  for_each = toset([
    "ssh_listen_port",
    "rdp_listen_port",
    "https_listen_port",
    "proxy_timeout",
    "keepalive_interval"
  ])
  
  option_name = each.key
}
```

### Using Configuration in Resources

**Connection Policies:**

```terraform
resource "wallix-bastion_connection_policy" "default" {
  policy_name     = "default_policy"
  session_timeout = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.session_timeout.value
  max_sessions    = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.max_sessions.value
}
```

**User Accounts:**

```terraform
resource "wallix-bastion_user" "default_user" {
  user_name       = "testuser"
  password_policy = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.password_policy.value
}
```

**Encryption Settings:**

```terraform
resource "wallix-bastion_encryption" "default" {
  type     = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.encryption_algorithm.value
  key_size = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.encryption_key_size.value
}
```

### Configuration Validation

**Type Checking:**

```terraform
locals {
  # Validate numeric configuration
  session_timeout_num = tonumber(data.wallix-bastion_configoption.session_timeout.value)
  
  # Validate boolean configuration
  mfa_required_bool = tobool(data.wallix-bastion_configoption.mfa_required.value)
  
  # Validate string configuration
  log_level_valid = contains(["debug", "info", "warning", "error"], 
                            data.wallix-bastion_configoption.log_level.value)
}
```

```terraform
    mfa_enabled     = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.mfa_required.value
```

### Error Handling

**Configuration Existence Check:**

```terraform
data "wallix-bastion_configoption" "optional_setting" {
  option_name = "optional_feature_enabled"
  
  # Handle if option doesn't exist
  lifecycle {
    postcondition {
      condition     = self.value != null
      error_message = "Configuration option 'optional_feature_enabled' must be set."
    }
  }
}
```

```terraform
  description = "Summary of key bastion configuration settings"
  value = {
    system = {
      version         = data.wallix-bastion_version.current.version
      session_timeout = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.session_timeout.value
      max_sessions   = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.max_sessions.value
    }
    security = {
      mfa_required      = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.mfa_required.value
      password_policy   = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.password_policy.value
      encryption        = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.encryption_algorithm.value
    }
    network = {
      ssh_port   = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.listen_port.value
      rdp_port   = data.wallix-bastion_configoption.rdp_port.value
```

### Configuration Compliance

**Security Compliance Check:**

```terraform
locals {
  security_compliance = {
    mfa_enabled = tobool(data.wallix-bastion_configoption.mfa_required.value)
    strong_encryption = contains(["AES256", "ChaCha20"], 
                                data.wallix-bastion_configoption.encryption_algorithm.value)
    session_timeout_ok = tonumber(data.wallix-bastion_configoption.session_timeout.value) <= 60
    logging_adequate = contains(["info", "warning", "error"], 
                               data.wallix-bastion_configoption.log_level.value)
  }
  
  compliance_score = length([for k, v in local.security_compliance : k if v])
}

output "security_compliance_report" {
  value = {
    checks_passed = local.compliance_score
    total_checks  = length(local.security_compliance)
    details      = local.security_compliance
  }
}
```

## Import

Configuration options are read-only data sources and cannot be imported.

## Read-Only Attributes

- **option_name**: The name of the configuration option
- **value**: The current value of the configuration option
- **description**: Description of the configuration option (if available)
- **type**: Data type of the configuration option (string, number, boolean)
- **default_value**: Default value of the configuration option (if available)
